changes.text: Added In-Vehicle Voice Feedback to share instant feedback with Ford
Improvement/adjustment of previous OTA 4.1.3
Smart changes Here and There
Update allows you to connect to public Wi-Fi hotspot throught SYNC
Adds camera icon to header bar for 2023MY vehicles
Improvement/adjustment of previous OTA 4.1.2
SYNC updated to Version 23031 Rev. 713
Volume knob enables control of cabin temperature, fan speed and heated seats
New games: Bridge Battle and Parking Lot
Improvement/adjustment of previous OTA 4.1.1
This particular update will set you up for all future ones to come. Think of it as the update that opens the door for all the others to enter through
Ability to enter your vehicle using your Key Fob during a non-drivable update

Pop-up alerts to inform you when a precondition is not being met so that you can take the required action to receive your update. For a non-drivable update, preconditions may include that your vehicle is parked, it's not running, all the lights are off, doors and trunk are closed, and you're not pressing the brake pedal
SYNC update to support public WiFi
Volume knob enables control of cabin temperature, fan speed and heated seats
New games: Bridge Battle and Parking Lot
New SYNC UI design
SYNC updated to Version 22326 Rev. 640
Adds ability to enter your vehicle using your Key Fob during a non-drivable update

You'll now receive new pop-up alerts to inform you when a precondition is not being met so that you can take the required action to receive your update. For a non-drivable update, preconditions may include that your vehicle is parked, it's not running, all the lights are off, doors and trunk are closed, and you're not pressing the brake pedal
Improved the accuracy of distance-to-empty measurement
Added en-route battery pre-conditioning when utilizing the built-in navigation system
Customer Satisfaction Program 22B28
HVAC update to improve the heat capability at or below -15C/5F
Customer Satisfaction Program 21B36
Fine tuning Phone As A Key software
Minor fine-tuning
Minor adjustment. Support for two Bluetooth phones simultaneously
Video streaming apps for US vehicles: YouTube, NBC News, NBC Today
Video streaming requires a Wi-Fi connection or an active Ford Streaming Connected Service plan
Dynamic Screen Resizing When you're using Android Auto™ or Apple CarPlay®, you can now make them appear on your touchscreen in the size you prefer
Additional games: Lane Change, Sudoku, Jigsaw Puzzles
After this update completes, Ford provisions Amazon Alexa feature activation in the primary owner's Connected Services account and the vehicle enables built-in Alexa support shortly afterward
Enables full screen CarPlay & Android Auto
SYNC new design, updated to Version 22228 Rev. 539
Preparing your vehicle for Alexa Built-in
Minor GWM Update
Preparing your vehicle for Alexa Built-in
A small adjustment so your vehicle can prepare for future updates that are more complex
Minor Adjustments
Added horn and lights feature in FordPass without Bluetooth connection
The functionality of rear-view cameras has been improved
Added picture in picture capability to Trailer reverse guidance. Some camera views are now available while driving
Prepares for future power steering control module (PSCM) OTA updates by ensuring that a failure to de-inhibit condition is prevented
Minor Adjustments
BlueCruise map updates
Alexa Built-in
Climate control touchscreen options and menus are improved for easier and faster access
Updated digital owner's manual
Second update in the 3 update series to add Alexa Built-in
Advanced dual phone (concurrent access to up to two Bluetooth connected phones for incoming calls, contacts, text messages, emails, and more)
Preparation for Ford Streaming (music and podcasts) subscription option
Additional games: Lane Change, Sudoku, Jigsaw Puzzles
Android Auto can be expanded to fill more of the display (it now resizes to fill either of the two view expansion states)
Updated SYNC to Software Version: 22179_PRODUCT Revision: 478
Advanced dual phone (concurrent access to up to two Bluetooth connected phones for incoming calls, contacts, text messages, emails, and more)
Updated digital owner's manual
Additional game: DoubleSum (requires SYNC 4A)
Addresses issue to ensure that payload limit warning (requires Onboard Scales function) appears on top of other open panes
First update in the 3 update series to add Alexa Built-in
Minor adjustments
Update to address recalls 22S41 & 22S29
Includes all previous powertrain fixes including faster charging curve, battery capacity increase, and brake pedal feel
Improved DC Fast Charging
Update to prevent erroneous DTC U1A01:93 from being set in the TCU
Minor adjustment to prepare for future updates
Brake pedal feel is modified to allow for smoother braking
Some additional minor fine-tuning here and there
Addresses recall 22S41, to protect high-voltage battery components (contactors) from excessive heat generated during DC fast charging and repeated full throttle events
Addresses recall 22S29 for applicable vehicles, fixing a software glitch that could potentially cause unintended acceleration, deceleration, or vehicle movement
Minor updates here and there. Just small stuff to keep everything running smoothly
Minor adjustments
Some camera views are now available while the vehicle is in motion
Added Picture-in-Picture capability to the Trailer Reverse Guidance feature
Updated SYNC to Software Version: 22095_PRODUCT Revision: 421
Enabled BlueCruise hands free driving feature
Minor updates "Here and There"
Sixth update of several to enable BlueCruise
Enabled driver attention monitoring camera while cruise control and lane centering are enabled, with distraction messaging to driver "Watch the road"
Removed the nonfunctioning frunk button
Minor fine-tuning to keep everything up to date
Fifth update of several to enable BlueCruise
Pro Trailer Backup Assist refinements (Allows selection of the checkered target sticker or the yaw rate sensor to detect trailer angle)
Minor updates "Here and There"
Fourth update of several to enable BlueCruise
Updated SYNC to Software Version: 22028_PRODUCT Revision: 358
Small adjustments so your vehicle can prepare for future updates
Third update of several to enable BlueCruise
Added an information bar on the right side of Instrument cluster messages
Added tenths of a mile to Instrument cluster odometer above 10,000mi
Added a snowflake on the Instrument cluster when the temperature drops below 4°C or 40°F
Minor updates here and there
Fix 12V battery drain due to Instrument cluster backlight failing to turn off
Second update of several to enable BlueCruise
Fixed the brake pedal feel to allow for smoother braking
Updated the charging curve to increase charging speed above 80%
Minor fine tuning "Here and There" to ensure things are running smoothly
First update of several to enable BlueCruise
Fixed an issue with horn and lights feature in FordPass
Added Multi-Day OTA update scheduling for certain updates that require the vehicle to remain off for up to 30 minutes
Added "Update Now" function
Added Ford assistant. Activated by saying, "OK, Ford"
Added speed sign recognition to the driver assistance Adaptive Cruise Control sub-menu, replacing Intelligent Adaptive Cruise Control
Trailer Light Check can be activated from the FordPass app and from SYNC
Added additional Apple CarPlay navigation info to the instrument cluster
Added EV routing for Apple Maps (iPhone reads vehicle and battery data via CarPlay)
Fixed large format Apple CarPlay
Fixed issue causing inconsistent or incorrect display of an upcoming route step progress bar in the instrument cluster when using Android Auto navigation
Updated SYNC to Software Version: 22087_PRODUCT Revision: 415
Various user interface refinements, including a dismissal cue when sliding cards downwards and several organizational refinements to the navigation app
Minor updates
Added horn and lights feature in FordPass
Minor updates "Here and There" to keep things running smoothly
Enabled the "Horn & Lights" button in FordPass via cellular
Added new SecuriAlert feature
Added new trip logs (This version may not have been released)
Added remote vehicle setup using FordPass to setup profile preferences
Added navigation automatically making destination suggestions
Added new cloud connectivity combining voice commands with internet searches
Added Apple CarPlay displaying turn-by-turn navigation on the instrument cluster
Added pressing the volume knob to enable the calm screen
Added an "X" to the upper left corner to exit certain areas
Added large format mode for Apple CarPlay
Fixed ambient light graphic to no longer show the rear seats illuminated
Fixed SiriusXM Song/Artist alerts
Fixed audio settings resetting after a key cycle
Fixed Android Auto connection concerns
Fixed Sirius presets missing more than three pages after a key cycle
Fixed Information and entertainment screen freezing/locking up
Fixed Pro-Power Onboard messaging confusion after a tripped circuit breaker
Fixed Wi-Fi keyboard defaulting to UK English
Fixed WMA files not playing properly from a USB device
Fixed Intermittent blank information and entertainment screen
Fixed Apple CarPlay connection concerns
Fixed Bluetooth connectivity concerns
Changed user profile icons on SiriusXM with L radio to larger size
Updated SYNC to Software Version: 21174_PRODUCT Revision: 168
Various bug fixes
Some Minor fine-tuning to keep everything running smoothly.
Added SecuriAlert (sends an alert to FordPass app when a door is opened)
Fine-tuned Pro Power Onboard
Minor bug fixes and refinements
eCall software update
Updated SYNC to Software Version: 21139_PRODUCT Revision: 263
Bug fixes and minor refinements
Corrects the issue with Zone Lighting battery concern
Bug fixes and minor refinements
